{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed day in mid/small caps. Metals led (HINDCOPPER broke out with big volume). PSU rails/infra consolidated but held key supports (RVNL ~311-313, NBCC ~112-113). Our book slipped modestly; GMRAIRPORT closed just below the ~103.8 risk reference but not a decisive breakdown yet. No emergency actions. Plan: strength-only entries on Monday if triggers fire; preserve cash.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Breakout continuation (buy on strength/pullback)", "reason": "Fresh high-volume breakout; consider buys on minor dips 352-358 or strength >368-370; manage risk 346/340", "price": 365.75},
    {"symbol": "RVNL", "signal": "Breakout buy on strength", "reason": "Coiling; clean trigger >329.9-330 opens 338/345; risk reference 307/311", "price": 312.40},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Add on breakout", "reason": "Constructive above 112; momentum trigger >118.9-119 can open 123/126; invalidate below ~111.5", "price": 112.52},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Continuation buy (strength-only)", "reason": "Base above 302 intact; next leg only if >314-316; risk 297 (hard) / 291 (absolute)", "price": 300.45},
    {"symbol": "GMRAIRPORT", "signal": "Add only on strength; watch support", "reason": "Hold bias while >102.5; re-add only on decisive >109.6-110; treat <102 with volume as weakness", "price": 103.06},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Continuation buy (strength-only)", "reason": "Trend extension on push >360-361; manage risk below ~346", "price": 349.40},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Breakout follow-through (strength-only)", "reason": "Higher-low above 1004 intact; add only on >1040/1050; invalidation below ~1004", "price": 1013.50},
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Trigger >161.4 improves momentum; pullback buys 158-159 with tight risk acceptable", "price": 160.21},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Strength-only buy", "reason": "Momentum improves >418; extension >432; risk ~400-403", "price": 407.15},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Reclaim/momentum buy", "reason": "Stability improves >1600; real momentum >1665-1670; cut idea if <1508-1525", "price": 1536.30}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 868.95,
    "total_value": 26256.65,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "GMRAIRPORT: 40 @ 108.40 (CMP 103.06)",
      "LTF: 20 @ 311.20 (CMP 300.45)",
      "RVNL: 20 @ 324.10 (CMP 312.40)",
      "ABCAPITAL: 10 @ 357.60 (CMP 349.40)",
      "NBCC: 40 @ 116.65 (CMP 112.52)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 1 @ 1031.35 (CMP 1013.50)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Holdings risk lines (emergency only if decisively broken): GMRAIRPORT ~102.5 (soft) / 101.8 (hard); LTF <297 (hard) / <291 (absolute); RVNL sustained <309-311; ABCAPITAL <346; NBCC <111.5; LAURUSLABS <1004. None triggered decisively today.",
    "Metals: HINDCOPPER leadership with volume; continuation if >368-370. SAIL still capped below 135-145 zone; avoid until breakout.",
    "PSU rail/infra: RVNL needs >330 for clean breakout; NBCC >118.9-119 for momentum; IRCON stable but momentum only >165.",
    "Banks/NBFC: LTF base intact above 302; continuation requires >314-316. UNIONBANK/INDIANB range-bound; AUBANK healthy >938-953.",
    "IT/Services: KPITTECH momentum >1275/1284; COFORGE/MPHASIS constructive on dips.",
    "Exchanges/Depositories: CDSL needs reclaim >1600 then >1665-1670 for momentum; BSE stabilizing but better >2849-2895.",
    "Autos: ASHOKLEY watch >161.4 for follow-through; ESCORTS needs >3830 to improve structure.",
    "Pharma: LAURUSLABS add only on strength >1040/1050; BIOCON attempting base, watch >402/412.",
    "Power/Renewables: NTPCGREEN range 90.8-95.5 (confirm >95.5); INOXWIND choppy; KPIGREEN constructive >450.",
    "Realty/Hospitals: PRESTIGE momentum if >1667; OBEROIRLTY constructive above 1640; MAXHEALTH/NH firm on dips.",
    "Execution: No trades until Monday unless a true emergency stop is decisively breached. With ~₹0.87k cash, any new entry Monday must be small and funded only if a high-conviction trigger fires."
  ]
